entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
